definition: Shijingshan inner district of west Beijing
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Yang Shulin is a gourd pyrography artist in Shijingshan District.
sentences.chinese: 楊淑林，現居石景山區，葫蘆烙畫藝人。

sentences.english: Taijing School is located in the Nhorth-west Back Street of Yamenkou Village , Shijingshan District.
sentences.chinese: 臺京學校位於石景山區衙門口村西南后街。
